name: Clouds Holidays Expo
description:
It's the Big Day, Today is the first day of Clouds Holidays Expo. We hope you will spend a great time among us.

- Use the Arrow Keys to move your Character and interact with the environnement.

Made with bitsy : ledoux.itch.io/bitsy
Music: Hope for Tomorrow by Tokyo Music Walker https://soundcloud.com/user-356546060
